ComicInfo.Title: The Scarab Strikes; The Rescue
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Scarab Strikes: Thieves steal the Eye of Horus from Egypt and try to sell it in Chicago. The Scarlet Scarab follows them from Egypt and meets Thor and the two of them capture the thieves.
The Rescue: Balder and the Warriors Three rescue Idunn from the clutches of Tyr and Loki.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:33:50. [Issue ID 36934]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Characters: Thor,Sub-Mariner] (flashback,Brenda Barclay,Scarlet Scarab [Foroul] (villain),Mr. Leibowitz,Dr. Abdul Faroul (flashback),Shawna Lynde,Invaders [Human Torch,cameo)
